info.name: Night Planet
info.description:
Read novels in a bright room with a dark theme. Join the DARK side!! . (NovelPlanet dark theme)

A simple dark theme for NovelPlanet.

 Version 0.2
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.2
-Remove the rounded borders for a simple look.
-minor changes for the "recent updates, most popular... " buttons.
-Clean the style from the useless lines.
